title: Vehicle Routing CLI Application
body: A CLI application that solves a vehicle routing problem for the WUG Postal Service Company. This is a class project written using the Python Standard Library. It finds an close to optimal schedule for the delivery of 40 packages dispersed on 3 trucks. The algorithm uess a Nearest Insertion algorithm to choose which truck to place a package and optimizes the route for each truck. It also contains a CLI to check the statuses of packages.

title: Inventory Management Application
body: An inventory management application for products, their constituent parts, and their prices.

body: A CLI application to manage a student roster.
